thread.title: Man United fans are divided over Wayne Rooney’s decision to stay [Tweets]
thread.title_full: Man United fans are divided over Wayne Rooney’s decision to stay [Tweets]

author: James
title: Man United fans are divided over Wayne Rooney’s decision to stay [Tweets]
text:
Man United fans are divided over Wayne Rooney’s decision to stay [Tweets] By James   Rooney stays 
So Wayne Rooney is sticking around for the time being. It would be a lie to say that Manchester United fans don’t know how to feel – they’re very sure of where they stand. It’s just that one half of their support is pleased and the other is groaning loudly at the news. The United captain is one of the most divisive figures in English football. Divided fan base 
His goal against Stoke in December made him the club’s all-time leading scorer. It was a strike that ensured Rooney’s place in United history – and showed he can still occasionally come up with the goods. Rooney fans will point to the many United records he holds to support their argument that he’s worth keeping around. 
Those in the ‘get rid of Rooney’ camp would concede that he is a club legend, that he’s given so much to the club in the 12 years he’s been at Old Trafford. However, it’s worth taking that longevity into consideration when looking at his exploits, especially in the last few years. Or as some United fans might call them, the Rooney decline years. 
Read the tweets to see a divided fan base digest the news. Wayne Rooney confirms he is staying at Man Utd and looks forward to severely slowing the team down on the rare occasions he does feature.
